name: NBT Storage
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: NBT Storage is custom block that allow input/output custom data to block. Mostly provided for ID support.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/nbt_storage/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your NBT Storage to a computer to make use of it!
